documents.document: ya ever watch a movie and just know it was directed by a man
need a shower badly so beanie to cover my hair it is
need more nocturnes in my life
my love for lasagne has caused me to burn my throat why would lasagne hurt me like this
you know i honestly forgot tony hawk was a real person i only ever think about the playstation games
ive so many books to read and yet i keep!!! buying!!!! more!!!!!
just love when my stomach rumbles really loudly in the library
instead of working on essays im sat here in the library rediscovering songs from my youth + getting nostalgic
my laptop screen is so fucked it's hilarious https://t.co/8WYx16sTG7
why does everyone in my family chew so loud i feel ill
i think i left all my motivation behind in 2013
it's 12 o'clock and im still not dressed yet, might go back to bed
want to be in berlin
listening to los campesinos nd really wishing it was summer
im not bitter i just wanna know how
why is everyone i know so cheery
why is toothless the cutest thing to ever be animated
how did i only just realise they have how to train your dragon on netflix????
i should not have drank that much 7up, what is self control
i should not be drinking this much 7up
y am i such a stereotypical arts student
want it to be summer again. and for summer to actually be sunny.
the ending of cruel intentions is arguably one of the most iconic movie endings ever
my stomach rumbled and now my dog is really concerned
fantastic mr fox is on netflix my afternoon is sorted
90s damon albarn will always be the person i fancy most
what an absolute babe https://t.co/Ujo8eQIunu
i legit actually looked decent last night before i snuck off to the toilets to cry
so hungover im actually craving meat wtf
one part of me will hate myself if i go in for my tutorial, a much larger part will hate myself for missing it
was planning on being sensible but got way more drunk than I mean to. of course.
oh man the amount of calories in drink makes me wanna dieeeeeee
time for cold pizza and pure self hatred
everyone is still doing their makeup so im sat here taking selfies https://t.co/HKLsPP4Kny
i live for when @drag_lou does my makeup https://t.co/jhaddeSdVV
i think this semester has gotten off to an even worse start than last semester. somehow.
there are so many things i should be doing rn. how many of them am i doing? none.
i just remembered she was talking about billy bragg to she's fab
my english tutor loves pete doherty and nick cave and i love her
i have a constant internal conflict as to whether to spend my food money on books or albums
my mood rn needs some cocteau twins and beach house
the thought of leaving the house to go to tutorials is making me wanna die
buying these was a really good idea even if im really broke now https://t.co/p92cLFLKkg
i just watched a video of a kitten falling asleep on a plate and now im crying god im tired
i was supposed to buy a history book with that whoops
just spent â‚¬30 on albums cause i was sad and have no self control
please buy me this https://t.co/zqNtAIIVz3
gonna splash out and buy myself some new albums tomorrow cause if there's one thing im guaranteed to do when sad it's impulse buy
just cant bring myself to do anything anymore, id be bored if i weren't so lacking in energy
@arianna_owens_ edmund's alright, it's Edgar who's a totally boring cunt
where did my motivation go
i deleted most social media apps off my phone thinking id be more productive but now instead of aimlessly browsing i just take naps
sneaking into film lectures where they screen full films is always fab
tho wearing football socks with my docs is just smart i maintain. also all my other socks have holes in them.
ngl a lot of my poor choices of outfit can be traced back to something nicky wire wore in the 90s
need to motivate myself to go to college tomorrow and not just spend the day watching steven spielberg movies
it's been so long since i watched any of the indiana jones films that i forgot a) how epic the score is b) how much i fancy indiana jones
indiana jones + toast + trying to forget i have college tomorrow
i say that as if i don't watch pointless pretty much daily
I doubt it is but it'd be incredible if it was, evening viewing utterly sorted
if this is true i will be a very, very happy person https://t.co/37dpIBHbQs
ive no excuse for not being at a protest tonight other than i just didn't know they were on and im a terrible person
winona ryder is always the goal https://t.co/fGcXudeWh5
im sure there's something im meant to be doing but im already in my pyjamas so
had to get a book of american short stories for college and i can already see my dad eyeing it up to steal it
yknow maybe not sleeping for an entire night was a bad idea
lost my ipod and was ready to accept death as the only answer until i found itd fallen beside my bed
i legit don't care whether it's shit or not it's 90s damon albarn
y did no one tell me damon albarn was in a film in the 90s
johnny lee miller is v hot as sick boy but like the character is a total cunt y are people so into him
also the soundtrack??? why didn't it i rewatch this sooner
cillian murphy is a work of art in it tho
now im rewatching pesky blinders instead of doing any work for college
watching Riverdale and o man Cole Sprouse is beaut in it
i think i gave up on doing that in like 3rd year
i honestly can't remember the last time i brushed my hair
the bus seat jumper strikes back https://t.co/qOmCmSrEte
was feeling sad so bought myself some makeup but bought myself the wrong foundation, well done me
always surreal seeing people from primary school in unexpected places
not near as good as the original, but then again it was never gonna be. still fucking great tho
Trainspotting 2 was fucking incredible
ive no shame about seeing movies by myself anymore tho, which is convenient
me nd my popcorn are head to see T2 cause my friend is like half an hour late
i should probs just give up and buy a new pair of skinny black jeans, ive had these since i was 14
The safety pins aren't for the aesthetic, they're literally holding my jeans together
jared leto is actually kinda hot in requiem for a dream, and it feels so weird thinking that about him
no one is free to go see trainspotting 2 tomorrow so fuck it i'll go myself
two and a half minutes to midnight https://t.co/x16yOTr69f
the world is a fucking shambles but it's perversely fascinating to see it get worse
it's the first week and im already behind on my history readings
am meant to be keeping to a budget but that went out the window last night
hate getting the bus home this early but too broke for a taxi
being left out of my college group but they're playing m-bop so fuck it
two 39As have passed this 39A by i am ready to scream
swear id get there faster by running rather than taking the bus
y am i so anxious i have nothing to be anxious about the semester has only just started
i thought i was happy w/ my results but not anymore
i hate when people directly ask me my results!!! leave me alone!!!!
billy corgan's snapchat is the main thing that's keeping me going at the moment
re reading trainspotting and i forgot how much bleaker the book is than the movie
